com.metreeca.gate.wrappers

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.gate.wrappers.Manager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wrapper

    public final class Manager
extends Object
implements Wrapper
    Single page app session manager.

    Manages the lifecycle of JWT-based sessions using permits issued by shared roster tool.

    See Also:
    https://jwt.io/, https://github.com/jwtk/jjwt

    • Constructor Detail

      • Manager

        public Manager(String path,
               long soft,
               long hard)
        Creates a session manager.
        Parameters:
        path - the root relative path of the virtual session endpoint
        soft - the soft session duration (ms); after the soft duration has expired the session is automatically extended on further activity, provided the hash of the user permit didn't change since the session was opened
        hard - the hard session duration (ms); after the hard duration has expired the session is closed, unless automatically extended
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if path is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if path is not root relative or either soft or hard is less than or equal to 0

        Wraps a handler.
        Specified by:
        wrap in interface Wrapper
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to be wrapped
        Returns:
        the combined handler generated by wrapping this wrapper around handler
